verses.verse: You shall not see <S%H7200><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>'s ox <S%H7794><s%> or his sheep <S%H7716><s%> go astray, <S%H5080><s%> and hide <S%H5956><s%> yourself from them: <S%H7725><s%> you shall surely bring them again <S%H7725><s%> to your brother. <S%H251><s%>

If your brother <S%H251><s%> isn't <S%H7138><s%> near to you, <S%H3045><s%> or if you don't know him, <S%H622><s%> then you shall bring it home to <S%H8432><s%> your house, <S%H1004><s%> and it shall be with you until your brother <S%H251><s%> seek <S%H1875><s%> after it, <S%H7725><s%> and you shall restore it to him.

So <S%H3651><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> with his donkey; <S%H2543><s%> and so you shall do <S%H6213><s%> with his garment; <S%H8071><s%> and so you shall do <S%H6213><s%> with every lost thing <S%H9><s%> of your brother <S%H251><s%>'s, which he has lost, <S%H6><s%> and you have found: <S%H4672><s%> you may <S%H3201><s%> not hide yourself. <S%H5956><s%>

You shall not see <S%H7200><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>'s donkey <S%H2543><s%> or his ox <S%H7794><s%> fallen down <S%H5307><s%> by the way, <S%H1870><s%> and hide <S%H5956><s%> yourself from them: <S%H6965><s%> you shall surely help him to lift them up again. <S%H6965><s%>

A woman <S%H802><s%> shall not wear men <S%H1397><s%>'s clothing, <S%H3627><s%> neither shall a man <S%H1397><s%> put <S%H3847><s%> on women <S%H802><s%>'s clothing; <S%H8071><s%> for whoever does <S%H6213><s%> these things <S%H428><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

If a bird <S%H6833><s%>'s nest <S%H7064><s%> chance <S%H7122><s%> to be before <S%H6440><s%> you in the way, <S%H1870><s%> in any tree <S%H6086><s%> or on the ground, <S%H776><s%> with young ones <S%H667><s%> or eggs, <S%H1000><s%> and the hen <S%H517><s%> sitting <S%H7257><s%> on the young, <S%H667><s%> or on the eggs, <S%H1000><s%> you shall not take <S%H3947><s%> the hen <S%H517><s%> with the young: <S%H1121><s%>

you shall surely <S%H7971><s%> let the hen <S%H517><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> but the young <S%H1121><s%> you may take <S%H3947><s%> to yourself; <S%H3190><s%> that it may be well with you, <S%H748><s%> and that you may prolong your days. <S%H3117><s%>

When you build <S%H1129><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> then you shall make <S%H6213><s%> a battlement <S%H4624><s%> for your roof, <S%H1406><s%> that you don't <S%H7760><s%> bring blood <S%H1818><s%> on your house, <S%H1004><s%> if any man <S%H5307><s%> fall from there. <S%H5307><s%>

You shall not sow <S%H2232><s%> your vineyard <S%H3754><s%> with two kinds of seed, <S%H2233><s%> lest the whole fruit <S%H4395><s%> be forfeited, <S%H6942><s%> the seed <S%H2233><s%> which you have sown, <S%H2232><s%> and the increase <S%H8393><s%> of the vineyard. <S%H3754><s%>
You shall not plow <S%H2790><s%> with an ox <S%H7794><s%> and a donkey <S%H2543><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>
You shall not wear <S%H3847><s%> a mixed <S%H8162><s%> stuff, <S%H6785><s%> wool and linen <S%H6593><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>
You shall make <S%H6213><s%> yourselves fringes <S%H1434><s%> on the four <S%H702><s%> borders <S%H3671><s%> of your cloak, <S%H3682><s%> with which you cover yourself. <S%H3680><s%>
If any man <S%H376><s%> takes <S%H3947><s%> a wife, <S%H802><s%> and goes in <S%H935><s%> to her, <S%H8130><s%> and hates her,

and accuses <S%H7760><s%> her of shameful <S%H5949><s%> things, <S%H1697><s%> and brings up <S%H3318><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> on her, <S%H559><s%> and says, "I took <S%H3947><s%> this woman, <S%H802><s%> and when I came <S%H7126><s%> near to her, <S%H4672><s%> I didn't find in her the tokens of virginity; <S%H1331><s%>"

then shall the father <S%H1><s%> of the young lady, <S%H5291><s%> and her mother, <S%H517><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> and bring forth <S%H3318><s%> the tokens of the young lady <S%H5291><s%>'s virginity <S%H1331><s%> to the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> in the gate; <S%H8179><s%>

and the young lady <S%H5291><s%>'s father <S%H1><s%> shall tell <S%H559><s%> the elders, <S%H2205><s%> "I gave <S%H5414><s%> my daughter <S%H1323><s%> to this man <S%H376><s%> to wife, <S%H802><s%> and he hates her; <S%H8130><s%>

and behold, <S%H7760><s%> he has accused her of shameful <S%H5949><s%> things, <S%H1697><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H4672><s%> 'I didn't find in your daughter <S%H1323><s%> the tokens of virginity; <S%H1331><s%>' and yet these are the tokens of my daughter <S%H1323><s%>'s virginity. <S%H1331><s%>" They shall spread <S%H6566><s%> the cloth <S%H8071><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>
The elders <S%H2205><s%> of that city <S%H5892><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> and chastise him; <S%H3256><s%>

and they shall fine <S%H6064><s%> him one hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> them to the father <S%H1><s%> of the young lady, <S%H5291><s%> because he has brought up <S%H3318><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> on a virgin <S%H1330><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and she shall be his wife; <S%H802><s%> he may <S%H3201><s%> not put her away <S%H7971><s%> all his days. <S%H3117><s%>
But if this thing <S%H1697><s%> be true, <S%H571><s%> that the tokens of virginity <S%H1331><s%> were not found <S%H4672><s%> in the young lady; <S%H5291><s%>

then they shall bring out <S%H3318><s%> the young lady <S%H5291><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of her father <S%H1><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> and the men <S%H582><s%> of her city <S%H5892><s%> shall stone <S%H5619><s%> her to death <S%H4191><s%> with stones, <S%H5619><s%> because she has done <S%H6213><s%> folly <S%H5039><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to play the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> in her father <S%H1><s%>'s house: <S%H1004><s%> so you shall put <S%H1197><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> from the midst of you. <S%H7130><s%>

If a man <S%H376><s%> be found <S%H4672><s%> lying <S%H7901><s%> with a woman <S%H802><s%> married <S%H1166><s%> to a husband, <S%H1167><s%> then they shall both of them <S%H8147><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> who lay <S%H7901><s%> with the woman, <S%H802><s%> and the woman: <S%H802><s%> so you shall put away <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> from Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

If there is a young lady <S%H5291><s%> who is a virgin <S%H1330><s%> pledged to be married <S%H781><s%> to a husband, <S%H376><s%> and a man <S%H376><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> her in the city, <S%H5892><s%> and lie with her; <S%H7901><s%>

then you shall bring <S%H3318><s%> them both <S%H8147><s%> out to the gate <S%H8179><s%> of that city, <S%H5892><s%> and you shall stone <S%H5619><s%> them to death <S%H4191><s%> with stones; <S%H68><s%> the lady, <S%H5291><s%> because <S%H834><s%> she didn't <S%H6817><s%> cry, being in the city; <S%H5892><s%> and the man, <S%H376><s%> because <S%H834><s%> he has humbled <S%H6031><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s wife: <S%H802><s%> so you shall put away <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> from the midst of you. <S%H7130><s%>

But if the man <S%H376><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> the lady <S%H5291><s%> who is pledged to be married <S%H781><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and the man <S%H376><s%> force <S%H2388><s%> her, <S%H7901><s%> and lie with her; <S%H376><s%> then the man only who lay <S%H7901><s%> with her shall die: <S%H4191><s%>

but to the lady <S%H5291><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> nothing; <S%H1697><s%> there is in the lady <S%H5291><s%> no sin <S%H2399><s%> worthy of death: <S%H4194><s%> for as when a man <S%H376><s%> rises <S%H6965><s%> against his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and kills <S%H7523><s%> him, <S%H1697><s%> even so is this matter;
for he found <S%H4672><s%> her in the field, <S%H7704><s%> the pledged to be married <S%H781><s%> lady <S%H5291><s%> cried, <S%H6817><s%> and there was none to save her. <S%H3467><s%>

If a man <S%H376><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> a lady <S%H5291><s%> who is a virgin, <S%H1330><s%> who is not pledged to be married, <S%H781><s%> and lay hold <S%H8610><s%> on her, <S%H7901><s%> and lie with her, <S%H4672><s%> and they be found;

then the man <S%H376><s%> who lay <S%H7901><s%> with her shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the lady <S%H5291><s%>'s father <S%H1><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> shekels of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and she shall be his wife, <S%H802><s%> because he has humbled <S%H6031><s%> her; <S%H3201><s%> he may not put her away <S%H7971><s%> all his days. <S%H3117><s%>
A man <S%H376><s%> shall not take <S%H3947><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> and shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>'s skirt. <S%H3671><s%>
